channel.title: Engineering Manager on Hello!
channel.description: Recent content in Engineering Manager on Hello!

item.title: Project Team Health Check
item.description: One of the most crucial factors for a company to be successful is to have thriving teams. So for me, the health of the team is a very crucial KPI. At Appsilon we look at team health at various levels. We use Officevibe to track different team metrics on a company level and within different teams (tech team vs. operations etc.). Engineering managers hold regular 1-on-1 meetings with their reports.

item.title: What to read as a New Engineering Manager
item.description: Moving into Engineering Management (EM) from the Individual Contributors (IC) track is a career change, not a promotion. Your responsibilities and schedule change completely. In the beginning, it might be scary, at least for me it felt like a new job. I’d like to list resources that help me navigate this change. Here are the ones that I read on a regular basis when settling in the new role.
